TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypedDataSetGenerator extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("TypedDataSetGenerator class will be removed in a future release. Please use System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGenerator in System.Design.dll.")

Docs.summary: Used to create a strongly typed <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The TypedDataSetGenerator class is not intended for use as a stand-alone component, but as a class from which other classes derive standard functionality.
